descriptionDetail: A more complex controller action might return different types of action results depending on the values of the parameters passed to the controller action. descriptionDetail: For example, the modified Details() action in Listing 5 returns the Details view when you pass a valid product Id to the action. If you pass an invalid product Id -- an Id with a value less than 1 -- then you are redirected to the Index() action.

Materials: Wood

Custom Handmade Rustic Wooden Bathroom Vanity - Farmhouse Style Sink Shelf with Live Edge Reclaimed Handcrafted cabinet Wood Country Style


Welcome to TimberLush, where exceptional craftsmanship and rustic beauty meet. Our Custom Handmade Rustic Wooden Bathroom Vanity is crafted to elevate your bathroom with a touch of farmhouse elegance. Each vanity is uniquely handcrafted, ensuring top-notch quality and attention to every detail.

ðŸ”¹ Customizable Design: Our bathroom vanities are tailored to your preferred size and specifications. Contact us for personalized options that perfectly fit your space. Each piece is handmade, so minor variations from the photos are expected, adding a unique character to each vanity.

ðŸ”¸ Production Time: Quality craftsmanship takes time. Our standard production period is 2-3 weeks, ensuring each vanity is created with precision and care. We prioritize detail and durability, ensuring our products not only look stunning but also stand the test of time.

ðŸ”¹ Distinctive Features:

Personalized Sizes: Customizable to meet your specific dimensions and preferences.
Live Edge Detail: Features a beautiful live edge, showcasing the natural charm of reclaimed wood.
Expert Craftsmanship: Handcrafted with skill and dedication, using premium reclaimed wood.
Farmhouse Aesthetic: Ideal for farmhouse and country-style interiors.
Secure Packaging: Multi-layered packaging protects your vanity during transit.

NOTE: Products under 30 inch width are produced with one drawer.
